segments.text: Oh , I like the music on your radio . It's nice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! I always tune to this program when driving . So what's your favorite program ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like Winner's English very mush . You know the Beijing Olympic Games is right around the corner . We should learn English Well . It's on FM 96.6 , China Business Radio . You can get it on your radio too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't speak English at all .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's OK . The program is especially for the beginners like us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It begins at 6:40 every morning , and it goes for 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you so much . I'll try and catch that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The radio has brought us lots of convenience .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can also learn about the traffic condition through it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With the development of the society and technology , radio is nearly everywhere .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So we should take the advantage of it .
segments.speaker: S2
